title: New date for specialist sickle cell and thalassaemia counsellor update course
categories: NHS Sickle Cell and Thalassaemia Screening Programme

content.text: The PHE sickle cell and thalassaemia (SCT) screening team is pleased to announce a new date for the very popular specialist counsellor update course – 8 December 2021.
The course is delivered by King’s College London, funded by the national SCT screening programme team and is free to attend.
